Steps.Message: Update at 13:30 - We've liaised with our engineers and they have advised that they need to carry out some further repairs to the fault in order to restore the power in the area. To give them time to do this, we've had to make a change to the estimated timeframe. We're now estimating for the power to be back on between 15:30 and 16:30. In the meantime, the team have been able to replace some fault equipment that supports the network, restoring the majority of properties in the area. We're sorry to change the timeframe. We will keep you updated with progress.

We became aware of a power cut at 07:44. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 13:30 - We've liaised with our engineers and they have advised that they need to carry out some further repairs to the fault in order to restore the power in the area. To give them time to do this, we've had to make a change to the estimated timeframe. We're now estimating for the power to be back on between 15:30 and 16:30. In the meantime, the team have been able to replace some fault equipment that supports the network, restoring the majority of properties in the area. We're sorry to change the timeframe. We will keep you updated with progress.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
